mapper.select: SELECT r.REDPACKAGE_ID, r.USERID, r.REDGOLD, r.REDNUM, r.VERSION, r.TAG, r.CREATETIME, r.UPDATETIME, p.NICKNAME as P_NICKNAME, p.IMAGE_URL as P_IMAGE_URL, u.* FROM tb_redpackage AS r LEFT JOIN sys_app_user AS p ON p.USER_ID = r.USERID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT uu.*, au.IMAGE_URL, au.NICKNAME FROM tb_userrecredpinfo AS uu LEFT JOIN sys_app_user AS au ON uu.USER_ID = au.USER_ID ) AS u ON r.REDPACKAGE_ID = u.REDPACKAGE_ID WHERE r.TAG = #{TAG} ORDER BY r.CREATETIME DESC
